description: At the start of battle, if your creatures collectively have {CONDNAME_MINION_ASMODEUS}, {CONDNAME_MINION_BEELZEBUB}, {CONDNAME_MINION_MAMMON}, {CONDNAME_MINION_LEVIATHAN}, and {CONDNAME_MINION_BELPHEGOR}, your creatures gain {CONDNAME_MINION_LUCIFER}.\n\n{CONDDESC_MINION_LUCIFER}
name: Summon Lucifer
